pages.text: The Runic Matrix is a tricky device, upon creating this pack we realized the old matrix would be too weak! We used a more powerful transfiguration in order to make a better Matrix(its the same really!). By making a 2x2x2 square of Infusion Blocks and Using a Lucky Wand or Lucky Powder on it will magically turn it into a Runic Matrix! Give it a try!
